duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in testing of patient samples according to standard operating procedure.
Maintain updated understanding and knowledge of lab methods.
Provide guidance for new team members.
Maintain clean and organized workspace following GLP.
Recognize, escalate, and troubleshoot equipment malfunctions.
Communicate with team and other departments on various platforms.
Provide feedback on day-to-day schedule to lead/supervisor.
Assist teammates in completing daily tasks.
Maintain equipment and instruments, calibration, and expiration date.
Maintain sufficient inventory of material, supplies, and equipment in the laboratory.
Adhere to safety protocols and maintain a professional demeanor.
Complete required training including HIPAA/PHI privacy and security training.
Perform other assigned duties as needed.

education_certification.credential: BS/BA in a biological science or a related field
